summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3725 for the improvement of West 71st Street, from 28th Avenue Northwest to 32nd Avenue Northwest; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 45760, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
